amendment.description: To increase funding for the Department of Justice for the vigorous enforcement of laws protecting children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4368 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 5. Record Vote Number: 70.

action.text: Amendment SA 4368 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2069-2070) To increase funding for the Department of Justice for the vigorous enforcement of laws protecting children.
